content: Global Big Data Conference is offering  3 day extensive Bootcamp on Big Data  at Irving Convention Center, Irving, TX, USA. No prior knowledge of databases or programming is assumed. Big Data Bootcamp is targeted towards both technical and non-technical people who want to understand the emerging world of Big Data, with a specific focus on Spark workshop, Data Wrangling workshop, Machine Learning workshop , Deep Learning & Cognitive Analytics workshop, Microservices workshop, Docker & Containers tutorial, Hadoop, Splunk, IoT, Kafka, Solr, Hive, Real time streaming, Spark Streaming workshop, Industry vertical use cases , Big Data Best Practices, Security, Operations, NoSQL (Cassandra, Mongodb, Neo4j) workshop, Data Science, Java, R, Python & Scala.   Attendees will experience real Hadoop clusters and the latest Hadoop distributions. Why you should attend Big Data Bootcamp?  Unlike other big data training sessions, our bootcamp event is unique in the following aspects: Experts in the Big Data from the US with hands on experience provide the training Our training is vendor agnostic and provide hands-on exercise of installing and running jobs on Hadoop/Spark/Kafka/Splunk/Cassandra We can customize our training to your corporate needs 3 days of intense training (8 hrs/day) with multiple use cases to practice (equivalent to one full month's training from other sources) "Big Data Certificate 2016" will be provided upon completion of the 3 days training Who Should Attend:  Engineers, Developers, Architects, Networking specialists, Managers, Executives, Students, Professional Services, Architects, Data Analyst, BI Developer/Architect, QA, Performance Engineers, Data Warehouse Professional, Sales, Pre Sales, Technical Marketing, PM, Teaching Staff, Delivery Manager  Please register ASAP to take advantage of discount. Seats are limited ($200 discount for 3 days event Costs $1299/person, any 2 days $899/person, any 1 day $599/person)  Use Promotional code KDNUGGETS and register Register  |  Agenda  |  Speakers  If you have any questions concerning Big Data Bootcamp or group discounts, Please do not hesitate to contact events@globalbigdataconference.com or call 408-400-3769.

Big Data Bootcamp, Dallas, May 13-15

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Big Data, Bootcamp, Dallas, Global Big Data Conference, Irving, TX

This is a fast paced, vendor agnostic, technical overview of the Big Data landscape. No prior knowledge of databases or programming is assumed. Use code KDNUGGETS to save.


Global Big Data Conference is offering 3 day extensive Bootcamp on Big Data at Irving Convention Center, Irving, TX, USA.


No prior knowledge of databases or programming is assumed. Big Data Bootcamp is targeted towards both technical and non-technical people who want to understand the emerging world of Big Data, with a specific focus on Spark workshop, Data Wrangling workshop, Machine Learning workshop , Deep Learning & Cognitive Analytics workshop, Microservices workshop, Docker & Containers tutorial, Hadoop, Splunk, IoT, Kafka, Solr, Hive, Real time streaming, Spark Streaming workshop, Industry vertical use cases , Big Data Best Practices, Security, Operations, NoSQL (Cassandra, Mongodb, Neo4j) workshop, Data Science, Java, R, Python & Scala.

Attendees will experience real Hadoop clusters and the latest Hadoop distributions.

Why you should attend Big Data Bootcamp?

Unlike other big data training sessions, our bootcamp event is unique in the following aspects:
  • Experts in the Big Data from the US with hands on experience provide the training
  • Our training is vendor agnostic and provide hands-on exercise of installing and running jobs on Hadoop/Spark/Kafka/Splunk/Cassandra
  • We can customize our training to your corporate needs
  • 3 days of intense training (8 hrs/day) with multiple use cases to practice (equivalent to one full month's training from other sources)
  • "Big Data Certificate 2016" will be provided upon completion of the 3 days training
Who Should Attend:

Engineers, Developers, Architects, Networking specialists, Managers, Executives, Students, Professional Services, Architects, Data Analyst, BI Developer/Architect, QA, Performance Engineers, Data Warehouse Professional, Sales, Pre Sales, Technical Marketing, PM, Teaching Staff, Delivery Manager

Please register ASAP to take advantage of discount. Seats are limited ($200 discount for 3 days event Costs $1299/person, any 2 days $899/person, any 1 day $599/person)

Use Promotional code KDNUGGETS and register

Register |  Agenda |  Speakers



If you have any questions concerning Big Data Bootcamp or group discounts, Please do not hesitate to contact events@globalbigdataconference.com or call 408-400-3769.
